juzs.text: And the answer of his people was only to say: drive Lot’s family out of your town, indeed they are people who pretend to be (or want to remain) pure
So We saved him and his family except his wife, whom We destined her among those staying behind
And We poured down a rain (of stone) on them, and it was an awful rain on those who were warned
Say: all praise belongs to God, and peace (and well-being) upon His servants whom He chose. Is God better or what you associate (with Him)

Or One who created the skies and the earth and sent down rain for you from the sky, then We grew beautiful (and delightful) gardens with it that you could not grow their trees. Is there a god with God? No, but they are people who set up equals (for God)
Or One who made the earth a habitat and placed rivers through it and placed mountain for it and placed a barrier between the two seas? Is there a god with God? No, but most of them do not know
Or One who answers the distressed when he prays to Him and He removes the badness and makes you successors (inheritors) on the earth? Is there a god with God? You take a little notice
Or One who guides you in darkness of the land and the sea and One who sends the winds as good news before His mercy? Is there a god with God? God is above what they associate (with Him)
Or One who initiates the creation then brings it back and provides for you from the sky and the earth? Is there a god with God? Say: bring your proof if you are truthful
Say: no one in the skies and on the earth knows the unseen except God, and they do not realize when they will be raised
No, but their knowledge falls short about the hereafter, rather they are in doubt about it or they are blind about it
And those who disbelieved say: are we brought out when we and our fathers become dust
We and our fathers have certainly been promised this in the past. This is only stories of the earlier ones
Say: travel throughout the earth and see what the end of the guilty ones was
And do not be sad about them, and do not be troubled from what they plot
And they say: when is this promise if you are truthful
Say: perhaps, some of that which you want to be rushed is right behind you
And indeed your Master is graceful to the people, but most of them do not thank
And your Master indeed knows what their chests hide and what they disclose
And there is nothing hidden in the sky and on the earth unless it is in a clear book
Indeed this Quran tells the children of Israel most of what they disagree about it
And indeed it is a guide and a mercy for the believers
Indeed your Master judges between them with His command, and He is the powerful and the knowledgeable
So put your trust in God, indeed you are on the clear truth
Indeed you cannot make the dead hear, or make the deaf hear the call when they turn their back going away
And you are not a guide to the blind from their getting lost. You can only make someone listen who believes in Our signs and they are submitted
And when the word (of punishment) happens to them, We bring out a creature from the earth for them, speaking to them that the people were not sure of Our signs
And on a day that We gather from every community a group of those who denied Our signs, and they are set in rows
Until when they come, He says: did you deny My signs while you did not fully understand them by (your) knowledge, what were you doing
And the word (of punishment) happens to them because of what they did wrong, and they do not speak (a word)
Did they not see that We made the night in order to rest in it, and the day to see. There are certainly signs in that for people who believe
And on a day that the trumpet is blown, then everyone in the skies and everyone on the earth are scared except anyone who God wants, and they all come to Him humbled
And you see the mountains, thinking they are motionless while they move as the clouds move. God’s making, the One who made everything perfect. Indeed He is well aware of what you do
Anyone who comes with the good (deeds), then there is better than that for him, and they are safe from fear on that day
And anyone who comes with the bad (deeds), then he is thrown down into the fire on their faces, (and they are told) are you being repaid except for what you used to do
I am ordered to only serve the Master of this land, the One who made it sacred and everything belongs to Him, and I am ordered to be of the submitted ones
and to read the Quran. So anyone who is guided (to the right path),then he is only guided for himself, and anyone who loses the way then say: I am only of the warners
And say: all praise belongs to God, He is going to show you His signs so you recognize them, and your Master is not unaware of what you do
S. M. (Ta. Sin. Mim)
These are verses of the clear (and clarifying) book
We read to you from true story of Moses and Pharaoh, for people who believe

Indeed Pharaoh was high (and mighty) in the land and made his people into sects, weakening a group of them (children of Israel), killing their sons and keeping their women alive. Indeed he was of the corruptors
And We wanted to do a favor to those who were weak in the land and to make them leaders and to make them the inheritors
And to establish them (and give them power) in the land and to show Pharaoh and Haman and their troops what they used to fear

And We revealed to Moses’ mother to nurse him, and when you are afraid for him then throw him in the sea/river and do not be afraid and do not be sad, We bring him back to you and We make him one of the messengers
Then Pharaoh’s family picked him up, so that he would be an enemy and a sorrow for them. Indeed Pharaoh and Haman and their troops were sinners
And Pharaoh’s wife said: (he is) joy of eye for me and for you, do not kill him, perhaps he benefits us or we take him as a son, and they did not realize (what they were doing)
And heart of Moses’ mother became empty (of sorrow or fear or patience). She almost exposed him if We had not strengthened her heart in order to be of the believers
And she said to his sister: follow him. So she watched him from a distance, while they did not realize
And We previously prohibited the nursing mothers from him, so she (Moses’ sister) said to them: should I show you a household to take care of him for you and they are well wishers for him
So we gave him back to his mother to delight her and she would not be sad and so that she knows that God's promise is true, but most of them do not know
And when he reached his maturity and he settled, We gave him wisdom and knowledge. And that is how We reward the good doers

And he entered the city when its people were unaware, then he found two men fighting in it, this one from his own sect (Israelite), and that one from his enemy (Egyptian). Then the one from his sect asked for his help against the one from his enemy. So Moses punched him and killed him. He said: this was Satan's work, indeed he is an obvious misguiding enemy
He said: my Master, indeed I did wrong to myself, so forgive me. So He forgave him. Indeed He is the forgiving, the merciful
He said: my Master, because of what You favored upon me, I will never be a supporter of the guilty ones

So he was in the city in the morning afraid and watchful, then all of a sudden the one who asked for his help yesterday cried out for his help (again). Moses told him: indeed, you are certainly an obvious troublemaker

So when he wanted to attack the one who was enemy of both of them, he said: Moses, do you want to kill me as you killed a person yesterday? You only want to be a bully on the land and you do not want to be of the reformers

And a man came to him rushing from the far side of the city, saying: Moses, indeed the assembly men are consulting about you to kill you, so get out (immediately), indeed I am of the well wishers for you
So he went out of it afraid and watchful. He said: my Master, save me from the wrongdoing people
And when he headed toward Midian, he said: perhaps my Master guides me to the right way

And when he reached Midian’s water, he found a group of people watering (their animals) from it, and he found two women holding back (their animals) away from them. He said: what do you want? They said: we cannot water (our animals) until the shepherds drive (their animals) away, and our father is a very old man (Shu’aib or Jethro)
So he watered (their animals) for them, then he went back to the shade and said: my Master, indeed I am in need of whatever good you send down to me

Then one of the two women came to him walking bashfully, and said: my father invites you to pay your wage for watering for us. So when he came up to him and told him the story, he said: do not be afraid, you are safe from the wrongdoing people
One of two women said: my father, hire him, indeed the best one you want to hire is the strong and the honest

He said: I want to marry off one of my two daughters to you, on condition that you work for me eight years, and if you complete ten, it is of your own choice, and I do not want to make it difficult for you, God willing, you are going to find me of the righteous
He (Moses) said: this is (an agreement) between me and you, whichever of the two periods I complete, there should be no hostility against me, and God is the trustee over what we say

So when Moses completed the term and was traveling with his family, he noticed a fire from the side of the mountain (Mount Sinai). He said to his family: wait, I noticed a fire, maybe I can bring some news from it, or a piece of fire so you may warm yourselves
So when he came up to it, he was called from the tree in a blessed spot on the right side of the valley: Moses, indeed I am God, Master of humankind

throw down your cane. So when he saw it moving as if it was a serpent, he turned back running away and he did not look back. (He was told: ) Moses, come close and do not be afraid, indeed you are of the ones in safety

Insert your hand into opening of your shirt, it comes out white without any disease, and press your arm to yourself (to be free) from the fear. These are two proofs from your Master for Pharaoh and his assembly. They are indeed disobedient people
He said: my Master, I killed one of them, so I am afraid that they kill me
And my brother Aaron, he is more eloquent in language than me, so send him with me as a support to confirm me, indeed I am afraid that they deny me

He (God) said: We are going to strengthen your arm with your brother, and We give you both a reason so they would not touch either of you, and because of Our miracles you two and those who follow you are the winners
So when Moses came up to them with Our clear miracles, they said: this is nothing but fabricated magic, and we did not hear of this from our forefathers
And Moses said: my Master knows best who brought the guidance from Him, and who has the final home, indeed the wrongdoers would not succeed

And Pharaoh said: counselors, I do not know of any god for you other than me, so Haman light me a fire for me over the clay (to bake bricks), then make me a palace so I may look at god of Moses, and indeed I think of him as one of the liars
And he and his troops were unjustifiably arrogant on the land, and they assumed that they would not be returned to Us
So We took him and his troops, then We threw them into the sea. So see what the end of the wrongdoers was
And We made them leaders, inviting (people) to the fire, and they will not be helped on the resurrection day
And We made a curse follow them in this world, and on the resurrection day they are among the ugly ones
And We have certainly given Moses the book, after We destroyed the earlier generations, an insight and a guide and a mercy for the people, so that they may take notice
And you were not on the western side (of the mountain) when We issued the order to Moses and you were not of the witnesses
And We created generations (after Moses) and life was lengthened for them. And you were not staying among people of Midian to read Our signs to them, but We are the sender (of messengers)

And you were not on the side of the mountain (Mount Sinai) when We called (Moses), but this is a mercy from your Master to warn a people whom a warner did not come to them before you, so they may take notice

And if they suffer a tragedy because of what their hands sent ahead (what they did), then they say: our Master, why did You not send us a messenger so we follow Your signs and we become of the believers

Then when the truth came to them from Us, they said: why was he not given (miracles) like what Moses was given? Did they not previously disbelieve in what was given to Moses? They said: two magic (Torah and Quran) backing each other up. And they said: indeed we are disbelievers to all
Say: if you are truthful, then bring a book from God which is a better guide than them that I follow it, if you are truthful

So if they did not answer you, then know that they only follow their desires (and opinions). And who is more mistaken than someone who follows his desire (and opinion) without guidance from God? Indeed God does not guide the wrongdoing people
And We have certainly connected the word for them so they may take notice
Those whom We gave them the book before it, they believe in it
And when it is read to them they say: we believed in it, indeed it is the truth from our Master, indeed we were submitted before it
They are given their reward twice because of what they persevered, and they counter the badness with the goodness and they spend (in charity) from what We provide them

And when they hear useless (talk) they stay away from it and say: our deeds for us and your deeds for you, peace (and well-being) upon you, we do not want (to have anything to do with) the ignorant ones
Indeed you cannot guide anyone you like, but God guides anyone He wants, and He knows best who the guided ones are

And they said: if we follow the guidance with you, we will be taken away from our land. Did We not establish them in a safe sanctuary, to which fruits of everything are brought as provision from Us? But most of them do not know
And how many a town did We destroy that rejoiced (excessively) in their livelihood (and wealth)? So those are their houses, uninhabited after them, except a few. And We are the inheritors
And your Master is not destroyer of the towns until He raises a messenger in their center, reading them Our signs. And We are not destroyer of the towns unless their people are wrongdoers
And everything you are given is enjoyment of this world’s life and its decoration (and luxuries), and whatever (reward) is with God is better and more lasting. Do you not understand

Is someone whom We promised him a good promise and he meets it, the same as someone whom We made him enjoy the enjoyments of this world’s life, then on the resurrection day he is among the summoned ones
On a day that He calls them out and He says: where are My partners, the ones you were claiming

Those against whom the word (of punishment) is justified, say: our Master, these are the ones whom we misled, we misled them as we were misled, we clear ourselves (from them) before You, they were not serving us
And it is said: call on your partners (of God). So they call them, but they do answer them and they see the punishment, (and they wish) if only they were guided
And on a day that He calls them out, then He says: what did you answer the messengers
On that day the information is unclear to them, so they do not (even) ask each other
As for anyone who repented and believed and did good work, perhaps he will be of the successful ones
And your Master creates what He wants and He chooses (what He wants). There is no choice for them. God is flawless and is above what they associate (with Him)
And your Master knows what their chests hide and what they disclose

And He is God, there is no god except Him, all praise in the first (this life) and the last (the hereafter) belongs to Him, and the command (and making rules) belongs to Him, and you are returned to Him
Say: what do you think if God makes the night continuous over you until the resurrection day, what god other than God brings you light? Do you not listen
Say: what do you think if God makes the day continuous over you until the resurrection day, what god other than God brings you night to rest in it? Do you not see
And He made the night and the day for you by His mercy in order for you to rest in it and to pursue His bounty, and you may be thankful
On a day when He calls them out, then He says: where are My partners, those whom you were claiming
And We pull out a witness from every group, then We say: bring your proof. Then they will know that the truth belongs to God, and what they used to make up abandoned them

Indeed Qarun was from people of Moses, and he was unjust against them. And We gave him (so much) of the treasures that its keys was too heavy for a bunch of strong men. When his people said to him: do not be overjoyed, indeed God does not like those who are overjoyed

and pursue the home of the hereafter by what God gave you, and do not forget your share of the world, and do good as God did good to you, and do not pursue corruption in the land, indeed God does not like the corruptors

He said: it was only given to me because of my knowledge. Did he not know that God has destroyed (many) generations before him that were stronger than him and more than him in collecting (wealth)? And the guilty ones are not questioned about their sins
Then (one day) he came out to his people (dressed) in his jewelry. Those who wanted this world’s life said: we wish we had the same as what was given to Qarun, indeed he has a great fortune
And those who were given the knowledge said: woe to you, God’s reward for anyone who believes and does good works is better, and none gets it except those who persevere
So We sank him and his house down in the earth, then he had no body to help him other than God, and he could not help/defend himself

And those who desired his position in the day before began to say: wow, it seems like God increases and decreases the provision for anyone of His servants that He wants, and if it was not for God’s favor upon us He would have sunk us down (in the earth), wow, it seems like the disbelievers would not succeed
That is the home of the hereafter, We made it for those who do not want superiority on the earth or corruption. And the end belongs to those who control themselves
Anyone who comes with the good (deed) then he has a better (reward) than that, and anyone who comes with the bad (deed) then those who did bad deed are only punished for what they used to do
Indeed the One who mandated the Quran to you, certainly brings you back to place of return. Say: my Master knows best anyone who brought the guidance and anyone who is in obvious error
And you did not hope (or expect) that the book be passed on to you except as a mercy from your Master, so do not be a supporter for the disbelievers
And do not let them turn you away from God’s signs after it was sent down to you, and invite (people) to your Master, and do not be of the polytheists
And do not call on another god with God, there is no god except Him. Everything perishes except His essence (and His being). The command (and making rules) belongs to Him, and you are returned to Him
L.M. (Alif. Lam. Mim)
Do the people think that they are left alone and they are not tested if they say we believe
And We have certainly tested those before them, so God certainly knows those who are truthful and He certainly knows the liars
Or do those who do the bad deeds think that they outdo us? What a bad judgment the make
Anyone who is hoping to meet God, (should know) that God’s appointed time is certainly coming, and He hears all and He knows all
And anyone who tries (in God's way), indeed tries for himself. Indeed God doess not need any being
And those who believed and did good works, We shall remove their bad deeds from them and We shall reward them better than what they were doing

And We instructed the human being to be good to his parents, and if they try to make you associate (partners) with Me that which you have no knowledge of it, then do not obey them. Your return is to Me, and I inform you of what you were doing
And those who believed and did good works, We shall admit them among the righteous

And some of the people say we believed in God, but when he is harassed because of God, he considers people’s harassment as God’s punishment, and if help (and victory) comes from your Master they shall say: indeed we were with you. Does not God know better what is in the minds of humankind
And God certainly knows those who believed and He certainly knows the hypocrites

And those who disbelieved say to those who believed: follow our way and we shall carry (and take responsibility for) your sins. But they are not carriers of the least bit of their sins, they are certainly liars
And they shall carry their loads and loads (of others) with their loads, and on the resurrection day they shall be questioned about what they used to fabricate
And We have certainly sent Noah to his people and he stayed (and lived) among them a thousand years less fifty years (or nine hundred fifty years), then the flood took them while they were wrongdoers
Then We saved him and inhabitants of the Ark, and We made it a sign for humankind
And (remember) Abraham when he said to his people: serve God and be cautious of Him, that is better for you if you knew

You only serve idols other than God, and you create a lie. Indeed those whom you serve other than God do not possess any provision for you, so look for the provision from God and serve Him and be thankful to Him, as you are returned to Him
And if you deny, groups before you have also denied, and the messenger's responsibility is only the clear preaching
Did you not see how God initiates the creation and then brings it back? Indeed that is easy for God
Say: travel throughout the earth and see how He initiated the creation, then God creates another creation, God is capable of everything
He punishes anyone He wants and has mercy on anyone He wants, and you are turned over to Him
And you cannot weaken/escape (God) on the earth or in the skies, and there is no protector or helper for you other than God
And those who disbelieved in God's signs and meeting Him (in the hereafter), they are hopeless of My mercy and they have a painful punishment
So there was no answer from his people except to say: kill him or burn him. So God saved him from the fire. Indeed there are signs in that for people who believe

And he said: you only took idols other than God because of friendship among yourselves in this world’s life, then on the resurrection day some of you reject the others and some of you curse the others, and the fire is your housing and you will have no helpers
Then Lot believed in him and he (Abraham or Lot) said: indeed I am an emigrant to my Master, indeed He is he powerful and the wise
And We gave him Isaac and Jacob and We put the prophethood and the book for his descendants, and We gave him his reward in the world, and in the hereafter he is certainly of the righteous
And (remember) Lot when he said to his people: you certainly commit the indecency that none of humankind did it before you

Do you approach the males and cut off the way and you commit the unacceptable in your gatherings? But there was no answer from his people except to say: bring us God’s punishment if you are of the truthful
He said: my Master, help me against the corrupting people
And when Our messengers brought Abraham the good news, they said: indeed we are destroyers of this town's people, for its people are wrongdoers
He said: indeed Lot is in it. They said: we know better who is in it, we shall save him and his family except his wife who is among those staying behind

And when Our messengers came to Lot, he was upset about them and he felt uneasy about them, and they said: do not be afraid and do not be sad, for we are you and your family’s savior except your wife who is among those staying behind
Indeed We are bringing down a punishment on people of this town from the sky because they were disobeying
And We have certainly left part of it as a clear sign for people who understand
And (We sent) their brother Shu'aib to Midian. Then he said: my people, serve God and expect the last day and do not do mischief on the earth as corruptors
So they denied him, then the earthquake took them, and they became motionless bodies in their houses
And (We destroyed) Aad and Thamud, and it has become clear to you by their houses. Satan beautified their works for them, turning them away from the way even though they were able to see
And (We destroyed) Qarun and Pharaoh and Haman. And Moses has certainly brought them the clear proofs, but they were arrogant on the earth, and they were not overtaking (Our punishment)

We took each one (into punishment) for his sin, We sent some of them a sandstorm, and We took some of them with the awesome roar, and We sank some of them down into the earth, and We drowned some of them. God was not wrong to them, but they were doing wrong to themselves
The example of those who took a protector other than God is like the spider that makes a house for herself, and indeed the weakest house is the spider’s house, if they knew
Indeed God knows anything they call on besides Him, and He is the powerful and the wise
And these are examples, We give them for the people and only the knowledgeable understand them
God created the skies and the earth rightfully. Indeed there is a sign in that for the believers

Read what is revealed to you from the book and perform the mandatory prayer, for the mandatory prayer prevents from the indecency and the wrong (and unacceptable), and God's remembrance is certainly greater, and God knows what you do
